de.renew.dbnets.datalogic

Class QueryCall

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.renew.dbnets.datalogic.QueryCall

  • public class QueryCall
extends java.lang.Object
    The query call - the db-net's data logic layer's query's usage in the concrete db-net's view place.
    Author:
    Anton Rigin, National Research University - Higher School of Economics, Faculty of Computer Science, Master Degree Program "System and Software Engineering", the 1st year student. Term Project (Coursework) on the Topic "Reference and Data Semantic-Based Simulator of Petri Nets Extension with the Use of Renew Tool". HSE University, Moscow, Russia, 2019 - 2020.

      • executeQuery

        public java.util.List<de.renew.unify.Variable> executeQuery(java.sql.Connection connection,
                                                            de.renew.expression.VariableMapper variableMapper,
                                                            de.renew.unify.StateRecorder stateRecorder)
                                                     throws de.renew.unify.Impossible
        Executes the query.
        Parameters:
        connection - The database connection instance.
        variableMapper - The transition instance's variable mapper. Maps the net's variables' names into their values.
        stateRecorder - The state recorder instance
        Returns:
        The query results list.
        Throws:
        de.renew.unify.Impossible - If the database error occurred during the query execution.

      • checkBoundedness

        public boolean checkBoundedness(de.renew.expression.VariableMapper variableMapper)
        Checks whether the query's params which need to be substituted with the values are bound or not (whether they values are known by the variable mapper or not).
        Parameters:
        variableMapper - The transition instance's variable mapper. Maps the net's variables' names into their values.
        Returns:
        The true if the query's params are bound (if they values are known by the variable mapper), false otherwise.

      • formSqlQueryString

        private java.lang.String formSqlQueryString(de.renew.expression.VariableMapper variableMapper)
        Forms the SQL query string with substituted query params.
        Parameters:
        variableMapper - The transition instance's variable mapper. Maps the net's variables' names into their values.
        Returns:
        The SQL query string with substituted query params.
